# Parameter l as 0.5 version of the Polynomial
# The Field Capacity is the summation of the multiplications on each line

# Variables
# al   : alpha
# dep  : z parameter representing soil depth
#
# Other variables are the same as in the article.





0.8131647710603545 * 1
-0.1102031672431125 * al
0.09506884153342532 * al*al
0.011455932865381073 * al*al*al
-0.04965007316753883 * al*al*1/n
0.28382412107956645 * al*1/n*1/n
-0.1050035997168321 * al*1/n*Ks
0.07282709679978056 * al*1/n*q
-0.1589842741168267 * al*1/n*dep
0.014175516425969018 * al*Ks*Ks
-0.03494374375313618 * al*Ks*q
0.02476540402469592 * al*Ks*dep
0.1149747290807096 * al*dep
1.3989426440748427 * 1/n*1/n
-1.2155289954940884 * 1/n*1/n*1/n
0.6761182696846543 * 1/n*1/n*Ks
-0.5271869263673907 * 1/n*1/n*q
0.5580594840035178 * 1/n*1/n*dep
-0.1959168298025158 * 1/n*Ks
-0.12298540966949786 * 1/n*Ks*Ks
0.22652698068648264 * 1/n*Ks*q
-0.14982734551570032 * 1/n*Ks*dep
-0.09646615441904371 * 1/n*q*q
0.13445733734620835 * 1/n*q*dep
-0.1626018344970105 * 1/n*dep*dep
-0.3051626604946473 * Ks
0.06130721249420479 * Ks*Ks
-0.021003997737688032 * Ks*Ks*q
0.03281140582683211 * Ks*Ks*dep
-0.07069557592938963 * Ks*q
0.024012975895110422 * Ks*q*q
-0.06854300165868961 * Ks*q*dep
0.019207769964987353 * Ks*dep*dep
0.33815206287610744 * q
0.02943941769713415 * q*q*dep
-0.4789542530153339 * dep
0.1527851846068795 * dep*dep
